actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The arboreal grappler makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The arboreal grappler has two tentacles, each of which can grapple only one target.

special_abilities.name: Boscage Brachiation
special_abilities.desc: The arboreal grappler doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it climbs out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Mobile Grappler
special_abilities.desc: The arboreal grappler can move at its full speed when dragging a Medium or smaller creature it has grappled.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The arboreal grappler can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
